snowflake:position-deletes:v2.notes: Position deletes are supported for externally managed Iceberg tables only. Snowflake-managed tables use copy-on-write exclusively and do not produce position delete files.
caveats: Only supported when reading externally managed Iceberg tables that contain position delete files
Snowflake-managed tables use copy-on-write and never produce position deletes

snowflake:position-deletes:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:equality-deletes:v2.notes: Row-level equality deletes are not supported. Snowflake uses copy-on-write for all DELETE operations on managed tables.
caveats: Row-level equality deletes not supported; Snowflake uses copy-on-write for DELETE operations

snowflake:equality-deletes:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:merge-on-read:v2.notes: Merge-on-read is supported for externally managed Iceberg tables via the ENABLE_ICEBERG_MERGE_ON_READ session parameter. Snowflake-managed tables use copy-on-write exclusively.
caveats: Only available for externally managed Iceberg tables, not Snowflake-managed tables
Requires setting the ENABLE_ICEBERG_MERGE_ON_READ session parameter
Snowflake-managed tables always use copy-on-write

snowflake:merge-on-read:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:copy-on-write:v2.notes: Copy-on-write is the exclusive write strategy for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables. All DELETE, UPDATE, and MERGE operations rewrite affected data files.
caveats: Exclusive write strategy for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables
All DML operations (DELETE, UPDATE, MERGE) rewrite entire data files

snowflake:copy-on-write:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:schema-evolution:v2.notes: Full schema evolution supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables, including add, drop, rename, and reorder columns.
caveats: Schema evolution applies to Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables
Externally managed tables have schema controlled by the external catalog

snowflake:schema-evolution:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:column-default-values:v2.notes: Column default values are a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2

snowflake:column-default-values:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:nanosecond-timestamps:v2.notes: Nanosecond timestamps are a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2

snowflake:nanosecond-timestamps:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:hidden-partitioning:v2.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg partition transforms (year, month, day, hour, truncate, bucket, identity) but the bucket transform can negatively impact query performance.
caveats: Bucket partition transform may negatively impact query performance in Snowflake
Uses Snowflake clustering in conjunction with Iceberg partition transforms

snowflake:hidden-partitioning:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:partition-evolution:v2.notes: Limited partition evolution support. Partition evolution is managed through Snowflake's internal clustering mechanisms rather than native Iceberg partition evolution.
caveats: Partition evolution is managed through Snowflake clustering, not native Iceberg partition evolution

snowflake:partition-evolution:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:multi-arg-transforms:v2.notes: Multi-argument transforms are a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2

snowflake:multi-arg-transforms:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:time-travel:v2.notes: Time travel is fully supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables. For external catalog tables, time travel depends on periodic metadata refresh completing before snapshots expire.
caveats: Full time travel support for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables
For external catalog tables, time travel depends on periodic refresh completing before snapshot expiry

snowflake:time-travel:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:table-maintenance:v2.notes: Snowflake automatically handles table maintenance for managed Iceberg tables including auto-compaction, manifest compaction, and snapshot expiry. Orphan file deletion is not supported.
caveats: Automatic compaction of small data files (auto-compaction)
Automatic manifest compaction
Automatic snapshot expiry
Orphan file deletion is NOT supported

snowflake:table-maintenance:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:branching-tagging:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support Iceberg branching and tagging
caveats: Iceberg branching and tagging features are not available in Snowflake

snowflake:branching-tagging:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:read-support:v2.notes: Full read support for Iceberg tables in Parquet format. Supports both Snowflake-managed and externally managed Iceberg tables.
caveats: Only Parquet file format is supported for Iceberg tables
Supports reading both Snowflake-managed and externally managed Iceberg tables

snowflake:read-support:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:write-insert:v2.notes: INSERT INTO supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables. Externally managed tables can also support writes when using Snowflake as a REST catalog.
caveats: Fully supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables
Externally managed tables support writes via Snowflake Open Catalog (REST catalog)

snowflake:write-insert:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:write-merge-update-delete:v2.notes: MERGE, UPDATE, and DELETE are fully supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables using copy-on-write mode.
caveats: All DML operations use copy-on-write mode (rewrites affected data files)
Supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables

snowflake:write-merge-update-delete:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:catalog-integration:v2.notes: Snowflake supports multiple catalog integrations including Snowflake Open Catalog (Polaris), REST Catalog, and AWS Glue.
caveats: Supports Snowflake Open Catalog (Polaris), REST Catalog, and AWS Glue as external catalogs
Snowflake can also serve as its own Iceberg catalog for managed tables

snowflake:catalog-integration:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:hive-metastore:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support Hive Metastore as a catalog for Iceberg tables
caveats: Hive Metastore is not a supported catalog integration

snowflake:hive-metastore:v3.notes: Snowflake does not support Hive Metastore for Iceberg
caveats: Hive Metastore is not a supported catalog integration

snowflake:aws-glue-catalog:v2.notes: Snowflake supports AWS Glue as an external catalog for Iceberg tables. Read access via external tables and write support via REST catalog integration.
caveats: Read access to Iceberg tables registered in AWS Glue Catalog
Write support available via REST catalog integration

snowflake:aws-glue-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:rest-catalog:v2.notes: Snowflake supports the Iceberg REST Catalog protocol for external catalog integration.
caveats: Supports REST Catalog protocol for reading and writing Iceberg tables via external catalogs

snowflake:rest-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:nessie:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support Nessie as a catalog for Iceberg tables
caveats: Nessie catalog is not a supported catalog integration

snowflake:nessie:v3.notes: Snowflake does not support Nessie catalog
caveats: Nessie catalog is not a supported catalog integration

snowflake:polaris:v2.notes: Snowflake Open Catalog is built on the open-source Polaris project, providing native Polaris catalog integration.
caveats: Snowflake Open Catalog is Snowflake's managed service built on Polaris
Native integration with full read and write support

snowflake:polaris:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:unity-catalog:v2.notes: Snowflake can access Unity Catalog Iceberg tables via the REST Catalog API, but with read-only access.
caveats: Read-only access to Unity Catalog managed Iceberg tables via REST Catalog API

snowflake:unity-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:hadoop-catalog:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support Hadoop catalog for Iceberg tables
caveats: Hadoop catalog is not a supported catalog integration

snowflake:hadoop-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake does not support Hadoop catalog
caveats: Hadoop catalog is not a supported catalog integration

snowflake:jdbc-catalog:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support JDBC catalog for Iceberg tables
caveats: JDBC catalog is not a supported catalog integration

snowflake:jdbc-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake does not support JDBC catalog
caveats: JDBC catalog is not a supported catalog integration

snowflake:table-creation:v2.notes: Snowflake supports creating Iceberg tables as Snowflake-managed tables or as externally managed tables using external catalogs.
caveats: Supports CREATE ICEBERG TABLE for Snowflake-managed tables
Supports creating tables from external catalogs (Glue, REST, Object Storage)

snowflake:table-creation:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:variant-type:v2.notes: Variant Type is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2

snowflake:variant-type:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:shredded-variant:v2.notes: Shredded Variant is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2

snowflake:shredded-variant:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:geometry-type:v2.notes: Geometry Type is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2

snowflake:geometry-type:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:vector-type:v2.notes: Vector Type is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2

snowflake:vector-type:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:cdc-support:v2.notes: CDC Support is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2

snowflake:cdc-support:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:lineage:v2.notes: Lineage is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2

snowflake:lineage:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:statistics:v2.notes: Snowflake writes column-level statistics (min/max values, null counts, value counts) to Iceberg manifest files for managed tables and uses them for scan planning and file pruning.
caveats: Statistics are managed automatically by Snowflake for managed Iceberg tables
Externally managed tables retain statistics written by the originating engine

snowflake:statistics:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:bloom-filters:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support Iceberg bloom filters (Parquet-level or Puffin-based) for Iceberg tables. Snowflake uses its own micro-partition pruning and search optimization instead.
caveats: Snowflake uses proprietary micro-partition pruning instead of Iceberg bloom filters

snowflake:bloom-filters:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced
